name: David S.
text: I have had this outfit roof all my rentals and my personal house. They use the class 4 shingle. Every time I used them the owner sent out a senior guy and they did a great job. I would recommend them for the craftsmanship I received, they were quick and right priced. Thank you Gates!

name: Clancy's Client
text: Clancy went over the damage with the adjuster. Afterwards my insurance company approved the claim. Gates set a day that worked with our schedule to remove and replace the shingles. The next day they arrived at the same time and completed the work at noon. I'm very pleased with the quality of the work and how it was done.

name: BBB Reviewer
text: We used Gates for our recent roof replacement and we can't say enough good things about the whole process. We had several roofers visit us after a storm and we were immediately impressed.

name: Demetri's Client
text: Demetri coordinated very professionally with my insurance company. I'm very happy with them and intend to call Demetri next time I need a roof!

name: BBB Reviewer
text: He was persistent, knowledgeable, helpful and very responsive throughout our roofing project. It was his work with the insurance company and assessors that made it possible.
